text:
@marcorubio @Hope_Resists That sounds fishy. You've taken this report about younger people becoming infected and hospitalized and added something you can't back up

Nearly 40% of those hospitalized with coronavirus are younger than 54: CDC - ABC News via @ABC - https://t.co/XkDRJ9XwaE
